content: This came at a really important moment in my life. I’ve always been someone with high levels of anxiety, and now that I am coming upon a new big change in my life, my anxiety has been difficult to manage. I love these practices, but I feel really hooked on the whole idea that we don’t have to have a “perfect” next move. Reading those words calmed me in a big way. Uncertainty about my career path eats at me constantly. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
